title: Degree Deod Inv Sld Clean Size 2.7z Degree Ultra Dry Clean Invisible Stick Deodorant - Pack of 2
description: Degree Deod Inv Sld Clean Size 2.7z Degree Ultra Dry Clean Invisible Stick Deodorant - Pack of 2 helps keeps you fresh and dry, no matter what. A men’s antiperspirant that offers 48-hour dry protection with a clean neutral scent and a slight hint of citrus. Whether you’re having a long day in the office, playing sport outdoors, or working out in the gym you can be confident you’ll be protected from sweat and body odor. Designed by experts to be activated by your body heat, Degree Clean is a men’s antiperspirant deodorant stick that works as hard as you do, keeping you dry when you need it most. As well as being highly effective, Degree Clean has a clean neutral scent that will keep you fresh all day. Keep comfortable and confident thanks to Degree Clean's long-lasting formula that is tough on sweat, but not on the skin. It comes in an easy-to-use applicator stick - you simply turn the dial to raise the stick, apply a thin layer to your underarms and you’re ready for anything. Stay dry, cool, and confident thanks to Degree Men Clean. A men’s antiperspirant stick that offers 48-hour dry protection with a clean neutral scent and a slight hint of citrus. Body heat-activated Degree Men Clean gives you long-lasting protection when you need it the most. Degree. It won’t let you down.
